messages.name: Mayor #npc#
messages.text: Welcome to our town, stranger. As you might notice we are on the edge of what is known as the new frontier, albeit it a bit empty around here.

messages.name: Mayor #npc#
messages.text: What brings you here?

messages.name: Mayor #npc#
messages.text: Yes, freedom we have that here, but that freedom is a bit limited by our environment.

messages.name: Mayor #npc#
messages.text: Well, I have to go now. TELL SOMETHING TO DO.

messages.name: Mayor #npc#
messages.text: We have neither, nor can we provide any work and you look like you can use some.

messages.name: You
messages.text: Life is good.
Do you, #name#, want to die
messages.name: Leia
Leia
messages.text: I cannot kill you

messages.name: Leia
messages.text: You died

messages.name: Leia
messages.text: Goodbye then

messages.name: Old Joe #npc#
messages.text: And who the heck might you be strange fella, Haven't seen you around town.
Well if you are here, might you be interested in some 'Good stuf'? For some kind of payment ofcourse!
messages.name: Old Joe
Old Joe
messages.text: Get the hell out of here than!!

messages.name: Old Joe
messages.text: Pleasure doin business with ya

messages.name: Old Joe
messages.text: Ya don't got any, what are ya doin?? tryin to scam me?!

messages.name: #npc#
messages.text: Beautiful day for a walk isn't it?

messages.name: #npc#
messages.text: Welcome to our city hall, what can I do for you?

choices.text: I have a proposition for you (Bribe)

messages.name: #npc#
messages.text: If you don't need to be here please go away

messages.name: #npc#
messages.text: Always a pleasure seeing you!

messages.name: #npc#
messages.text: If you didn't need to be here, why are you here than?

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: Oh wow, I don't know what to say. Thanks for the 'donation' though!

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: You can't make a 'donation' without money

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: I don't know what to do...

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: We are all out of money....

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: I don't have any options left...

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: Do you have any idea what I should do?

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: You know what. You are right. I put my full trust in you.

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: Why would you even suggest that? That is a very stupid idea

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: Thank you! In these dificult times a 'donation' is always welcome!

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: I would love to have a 'donation', but it seems like you don't have that kind of money

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: I think I am doomed...

messages.name: mayor
messages.text: Oh don't mind me I am just withdrawing some money

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: Probably shouldn't do this after those few beers at the saloon

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: I can get quite forgetful

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: Well I should probably get back to work very soon

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: Get out of my home I am trying to sleep

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: Nice to see you. I can use someone to brighten the room while working

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: Go away while I'm working!

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: Would you like to be quiet while I'm working

messages.name: Mayor
messages.text: I'm sorry I would like to be left alone and enjoy my beer on my own.

messages.name: Postman
messages.text: Alright I am only going to say this once. Don't disturb my while I'm working. I am a busy man

messages.name: Postman
messages.text: Let me sleep I need to work the whole day tomorrow!!

messages.name: Postman
messages.text: LEAVE ME ALONE!!

messages.name: Postman
messages.text: Finally a break, so what do you want from me?

messages.name: Postman
messages.text: I.. I never received post before thank you very much!!!

messages.name: Postman
messages.text: Don't worry about it.. it's not like I received post ever anyway...

messages.name: Postman
messages.text: Just don't bother me then

messages.name: Sheriff
messages.text: I don't know who you are, but I don't trust you

messages.name: Sheriff
messages.text: I've heard about rumors that a tourist has made multiple cities very unstable

messages.name: Sheriff
messages.text: And my hunch says that you might had something to do with that...

messages.name: Sheriff
messages.text: What the do you think you are doing?! LET ME SLEEP!

messages.name: Sheriff
messages.text: Just.. let me work.. I am confused about things

messages.name: Sheriff
messages.text: Go away from here. I don't trust you being here

messages.name: Sheriff
messages.text: I don't like you being near the bank

messages.name: Sheriff
messages.text: Don't mind me I'm just having a walk *Stares intensely at you*

messages.name: Sheriff
messages.text: Don't do anything funny near our mayor

messages.name: GeneralStoreMan
messages.text: Hi! Nice meeting you, I hope you will enjoy it here in our little town

messages.name: GeneralStoreMan
messages.text: If you want to find me, I'll be spending most of the time at my store

messages.name: GeneralStoreMan
messages.text: Would you kindly let me sleep please

messages.name: GeneralStoreMan
messages.text: Welcome to the store my friend!

messages.name: GeneralStoreMan
messages.text: How can I help you?

messages.name: GeneralStoreMan
messages.text: How can I help you?

messages.name: GeneralStoreMan
messages.text: Thank you for buying come again!

messages.name: GeneralStoreMan
messages.text: I am sorry, but you don't have enough money

messages.name: GeneralStoreMan
messages.text: Welcome to my store!

messages.name: BankWoman
messages.text: Welcome to the city, if you need somewhere to leave your money come visit me!

messages.name: BankWoman
messages.text: Tell me can I help you with dropping of some money?

messages.name: BankWoman
messages.text: Thank you for dropping off the money!

messages.name: BankWoman
messages.text: No money on you right now? don't worry I'll wait

messages.name: BankWoman
messages.text: Thank you for your purchase!

messages.name: BankWoman
messages.text: Unless you got some money with you, please don't wake me up
